description.brazilian: Atingir 200 População
description.english: Reach 200 Population
description.french: Commencez une partie d'Escarmouche IA et atteignez une population de 200 unités.
description.italian: Inizia una partita schermaglia IA e raggiungi una popolazione di 200 unità
description.polish: Rozpocznij potyczkę z SI i osiągnij populację na poziomie 200 jednostek.
description.russian: Начать игру в режиме сражения с ИИ и достичь населения 200 ед.
description.schinese: 开始一场 AI 遭遇战，并达到 200 单位人口
description.spanish: Inicia una escaramuza contra la IA del juego y alcanza una población de 200 unidades

description.brazilian: Matar um total de 500 dinossauros selvagens
description.english: Kill a total of 500 wild dinosaurs
description.french: Tuez un total de 500 Dinosaures Sauvages
description.italian: Uccidi un totale di 500 dinosauri feroci
description.polish: Zabij łącznie 500 dzikich dinozaurów
description.russian: Убить всего 500 динозавров
description.schinese: 累计击杀 500 头野生恐龙
description.spanish: Mata a 500 dinosaurios salvajes

description.brazilian: Ganhar um jogo como o sábio construindo nada, mas Wisps e Raptors
description.dutch: Win een spel als Vithara door enkel Wisps en Raptors te maken
description.english: Win a game as the Sage by building nothing but Wisps and Raptors
description.french: Gagnez une partie avec le Sage en utilisant uniquement des Feux Follets et des Raptors.
description.german: Gewinne ein Spiel als der Weise, indem du nur Irrlichter und Raptoren baust
description.italian: Vinci una partita come Saggio costruendo solo Fuochi fatui e Velociraptor
description.polish: Wygraj grę jako Mędrzec, budując tylko ogniki i raptory
description.russian: Выиграть игру за Мудреца, не строя ничего, кроме светлячков и рапторов
description.schinese: 除了小精灵与迅猛龙，不建造任何东西，并作为贤者取得一场胜利
description.spanish: Ponte en la piel del Sabio y gana una partida construyendo únicamente fuegos fatuos y velocirraptores
description.turkish: Wisps ve Raptors'tan başka bir şey inşa ederek Sage olarak bir oyun kazanın

displayName.french: Domination des forts sur les faibles

description.brazilian: Ganhar 20 jogos Skirmish
description.english: Win 20 Skirmish games
description.french: Gagnez 20 parties d'Escarmouche.
description.italian: Vinci 20 partite schermaglia
description.polish: Wygraj 20 potyczek
description.russian: Выиграть 20 игр в режиме сражения
description.schinese: 赢得 20 场遭遇战
description.spanish: Gana 20 escaramuzas

description.brazilian: Capturar um total de 100 Go'n Santuários
description.english: Capture a total of 100 Go'n Shrines
description.french: Capturez un total de 100 Sanctuaires Go'n
description.italian: Cattura un totale di 100 Templi Go’n
description.polish: Zdobądź 100 sanktuariów Go'n
description.russian: Захватить всего 100 святилищ Г'она
description.schinese: 累计占领 100 处格昂圣地（可通过多局游戏完成）
description.spanish: Captura un total de 100 santuarios Go'n

description.brazilian: Recrutar 10 Golems, 10 T-Rexes e 10 mamutes em um jogo cada um.
description.english: Recruit 10 Golems, 10 T-Rexes and 10 Mammoths in one game each.
description.french: Recrutez 10 Golems, 10 T-Rex et 10 Mammouths.
description.german: Rekrutiere jeweils 10 Golems, 10 T-Rex und 10 Mammuts in einem Spiel.
description.italian: Recluta 10 golem, 10 T-Rex e 10 mammut in tre partite diverse.
description.polish: Zwerbuj 10 golemów, 10 tyranozaurów i 10 mamutów w pojedynczej grze.
description.russian: Нанять по 10 големов, 10 тираннозавров и 10 мамонтов в одной игре
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中分别招募 10 座魔像、10 头霸王龙、10 头猛犸
description.spanish: Recluta 10 gólems, 10 tiranosaurios rex y 10 mamuts en una partida cada uno.
description.turkish: Her biri bir oyunda 10 Golem, 10 T-Rex ve 10 Mamut topla.

displayName.spanish: Imperio de la edad de piedra

description.brazilian: Construir toda a estrutura no jogo pelo menos uma vez
description.dutch: Bouw elk gebouw in het spel minstens één keer
description.english: Build every structure in the game at least once
description.french: Construisez chaque structure/bâtiment du jeu au moins une fois avec chaque faction
description.german: Baue jedes Konstrukt/Gebäude im Spiel mindestens einmal für jede Fraktion
description.italian: Costruisci ciascuna struttura/edificio nel gioco almeno una volta per ogni fazione
description.polish: Zbuduj każdą budowlę każdej frakcji przynajmniej raz
description.russian: Построить хотя бы по одному зданию за каждую группировку
description.schinese: 每个派系的建筑至少建造一次
description.spanish: Construye todas las estructuras o edificios del juego al menos una vez en cada facción
description.turkish: Oyunda her yapıyı en az bir kere oluşturun

description.brazilian: Mina um total de 100000 cristais
description.english: Mine a total of 100000 crystals
description.french: Extraire un total de 100 000 Cristaux
description.italian: Estrai un totale di 100.000 cristalli
description.polish: Wydobądź łącznie 100 000 kryształów
description.russian: Добыть всего 100 000 кристаллов
description.schinese: 累计采集 100,000 水晶
description.spanish: Excava un total de 100 000 cristales

description.brazilian: Escolha todos os talentos pelo menos uma vez e ganhar um jogo com ele
description.dutch: Kies elke talent minstens één maal en win er een spel mee
description.english: Pick every talent at least once and win a game with it
description.french: Choisissez chaque talent au moins une fois et gagnez une partie avec. Répétez pour chaque faction
description.german: Wähle jedes Talent mindestens einmal aus und gewinne ein Spiel damit. Tu das für jede Fraktion
description.italian: Scegli ciascun talento almeno una volta e vinci la partita. Fallo per ogni fazione.
description.polish: Wybierz każdy talent przynajmniej raz i wygraj z nim grę. Osiągnij to każdą frakcją
description.russian: Выбрать хотя бы по одному разу каждый талант и выиграть с ним игру. Сделать это за каждую группировку
description.schinese: 选择每种天赋至少一次，并使用它赢得一局游戏。每个派系均需完成
description.spanish: Gana una partida con cada talento al menos una vez. Cumple este requisito en cada facción
description.turkish: Her yeteneği en az bir kere seç ve onunla bir oyun kazan

description.brazilian: Vence 10 jogos da equipe
description.english: Win 10 Team Games
description.french: Gagnez 10 parties en équipe
description.italian: Vinci 10 partite di squadra
description.polish: Wygraj 10 gier zespołowych z SI
description.russian: Выиграть 10 командных игр с ИИ
description.schinese: 和 AI 一起赢得 10 场团队赛的胜利
description.spanish: Gana 10 partidas en equipo con la IA

description.brazilian: Use todo o poder pelo menos uma vez
description.dutch: Gebruik elke kracht minstens één maal
description.english: Use every power at least once
description.french: Utilisez chaque pouvoir au moins une fois. Répétez pour chaque faction
description.german: Verwende jede Kraft mindestens einmal. Tu das für jede Fraktion
description.italian: Usa ciascun potere almeno una volta. Fallo per ogni fazione.
description.polish: Użyj każdej mocy przynajmniej raz. Osiągnij to każdą frakcją
description.russian: Использовать хотя бы по одному разу каждую силу. Сделать это за каждую группировку
description.schinese: 使用每种异能至少一次。每个派系均需完成
description.spanish: Usa cada poder al menos una vez. Cumple este requisito en cada facción
description.turkish: Her gücü en az bir kere kullanın

description.brazilian: Roubar 25 santuários de um inimigo
description.english: Steal 25 shrines from an enemy
description.french: Volez 25 Sanctuaires à un ennemi
description.italian: Ruba 25 templi a un nemico.
description.polish: Przejmij od wroga 25 sanktuariów
description.russian: Захватить у противника 25 святилищ
description.schinese: 从敌方偷取 25 处圣地
description.spanish: Roba 25 santuarios al enemigo

description.brazilian: Construir 4 Assentamentos, 10 torres e Fortificação pesquisa em um jogo
description.dutch: Bouw 4 thuisbasisen, 10 torens en onderzoek Fortificatie in één spel
description.english: Build 4 Settlements, 10 towers and research Fortification in one game
description.french: Construisez 4 Colonies, 10 Tours et recherchez Fortification en une partie.
description.german: Baue 4 Siedlungen, 10 Türme und erforsche Befestigung in einem Spiel.
description.italian: Costruisci 4 Insediamenti, 10 torri e ricerca Fortificazione in una partita.
description.polish: Zbuduj 4 osady, 10 wież i opracuj Fortyfikację w pojedynczej grze
description.russian: Построить 4 поселения, 10 башен и исследовать Укрепление в одной игре
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中建造 4 处定居点、10 座塔，并研究“加固”
description.spanish: Construye 4 asentamientos, 10 torres e investiga la fortificación en una misma partida
description.turkish: Tek bir oyunda 4 Yerleşim Birimi, 10 kule inşa et ve Araştırma Tahkimatı kur

displayName.brazilian: Eu entrei como uma bola de demolição
displayName.dutch: Met de deur in huis vallen
displayName.english: I came in like a Wrecking Ball
displayName.schinese: 如同破坏之王一样入场

description.brazilian: Destrua um total de 200 estruturas inimigas
description.english: Destroy a total of 200 enemy structures
description.french: Détruisez un total de 200 structures ennemies
description.italian: Distruggi un totale di 200 strutture nemiche.
description.polish: Zniszcz łącznie 200 budowli wroga
description.russian: Разрушить всего 200 вражеских построек
description.schinese: 累计摧毁 200 座敌方建筑
description.spanish: Destruye un total de 200 estructuras enemigas

displayName.french: Au sommet de la chaîne alimentaire
displayName.spanish: La cima de la pirámide alimenticia

description.brazilian: Matar 25 selvagem t-Rexes
description.english: Kill 25 wild T-Rexes
description.french: Tuez 25 T-Rex sauvages
description.italian: Uccidi 25 T-Rex feroci
description.polish: Zabij 25 dzikich tyranozaurów
description.russian: Убить 25 диких тираннозавров
description.schinese: 击杀 25 头野生霸王龙
description.spanish: Mata 25 tiranosaurios rex salvajes

description.brazilian: Bata campanha toda facção
description.english: Beat all faction's campaign
description.french: Terminez les campagnes de toutes les factions
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutte le campagne delle fazioni
description.polish: Ukończ kampanie wszystkich frakcji
description.russian: Пройти кампанию за все группировки
description.schinese: 完成所有派系战役
description.spanish: Gana en modo campaña con todas las facciones

description.brazilian: Ganhe um 1v1 Skirmish vs um muito difícil AI
description.dutch: Win een 1v1 spel tegen een zeer moeilijke AI
description.english: Win a Skirmish 1v1 vs a very hard AI
description.french: Gagnez une Escarmouche en 1v1 face à une IA très difficile.
description.german: Gewinne ein 1v1-Gefecht gegen eine sehr schwere KI
description.italian: Vinci una schermaglia 1v1 contro una IA molto difficile
description.polish: Wygraj potyczkę 1 na 1 z bardzo trudną SI
description.russian: Выиграть сражение 1 на 1 против очень сложного ИИ
description.schinese: 单挑非常困难的 AI 并获胜
description.spanish: Gana una escaramuza 1c1 contra la IA en modo muy difícil
description.turkish: Çok zor bir AI vs Skirmish 1v1 kazanın

description.brazilian: Jogar Survival Mode em médio e sobreviver até wave 25
description.dutch: Speel overlevingsmodus op medium en overleef tot golf 25
description.english: Play Survival Mode on medium and survive until wave 25
description.french: Jouez au Mode Survie en difficulté moyenne et survivre jusqu'à la vague 25.
description.german: Spiele den Überlebensmodus auf mittlerer Stufe und überlebe bis Welle 25
description.italian: Gioca in Modalità Sopravvivenza media e sopravvivi fino all’ondata 25
description.polish: Graj w trybie survivalowym na poziomie średnim i wytrwaj do fali 25
description.russian: В режиме выживания на средне сложности выжить до 25-й волны
description.schinese: 在中等难度的生存模式中，迎击 25 波敌人并生存下来
description.spanish: Juega al modo supervivencia en dificultad media y sobrevive al menos 25 oleadas
description.turkish: Ortada Survival Mode oyna ve dalga 25 kadar yaşa

description.brazilian: Ganhar 10 jogos com cada facção
description.english: Win 10 games with each faction
description.french: Gagnez 10 parties avec chaque faction.
description.italian: Vinci 10 partite con ogni fazione
description.polish: Wygraj 10 gier każdą frakcją
description.russian: Выиграть по 10 игр за каждую фракцию
description.schinese: 与每个派系一起，赢得 10 局游戏
description.spanish: Gana 10 partidas con cada facción

displayName.spanish: La habilidad activa es una aliteración

description.brazilian: Fundido com um total de 200 capacidades activas
description.english: Cast a total of 200 active abilities
description.french: Lancez un total de 200 aptitudes actives.
description.italian: Lancia un totale di 200 abilità attive
description.polish: Użyj łącznie 200 aktywnych zdolności
description.russian: Использовать всего 200 активных способностей
description.schinese: 累计释放 200 个主动技能
description.spanish: Lanza un total de 200 habilidades activas

displayName.italian: Una Ragazza e il suo T-Rex
displayName.spanish: Una chica y su tiranosaurio rex

description.brazilian: Recrutar "Reggie" no Mika Mission 2.
description.english: Recruit "Reggie" in Mika Chapter 2.
description.french: Recrutez « Reggie » lors de la mission 2 de Mika.
description.italian: Recluta “Reggie” in Mika Missione 2.
description.polish: Zwerbuj „Reggiego” w 2. misji Miki.
description.russian: Нанять Регги в 2-м задании Мики
description.schinese: 在米卡任务 2 中，招募“雷吉”
description.spanish: Recluta a "Reggie" en la misión 2 de Mika.

description.brazilian: Conclua Mika Mission 4 sem levantar o Sandstorm.
description.dutch: Vervolledig Mika missie 4 zonder de zandstorm op te heffen
description.english: Complete Mika Mission 4 without lifting the Sandstorm.
description.french: Terminez la mission 4 de Mika sans lever la tempête de sable.
description.german: Schließe Mika-Mission 4 ab, ohne den Sandsturm zu beseitigen.
description.italian: Completa Mika Missione 4 senza sollevare la tempesta di sabbia.
description.polish: Ukończ 4. misję Miki bez przerywania burzy piaskowej.
description.russian: Выполнить 4-е задание Мики, не устроив песчаную бурю
description.schinese: 在不释放沙尘暴的情况下，完成米卡任务 4
description.spanish: Completa la misión 4 de Mika sin levantar una tormenta de arena.
description.turkish: Kum Fırtınasını kaldırmadan Mika Mission 4'ü tamamla.

description.brazilian: Missão Char completa 2 sem acender uma única fogueira.
description.dutch: Vervolledig Char missie 2 zonder een kampvuur aan te steken
description.english: Complete Char Mission 2 without lighting a single Bonfire.
description.french: Terminez la mission 2 de Char sans allumer un seul bûcher.
description.german: Schließe Char-Mission 2 ab, ohne ein einziges Lagerfeuer anzuzünden.
description.italian: Completa Char Missione 2 senza accendere un singolo falò.
description.polish: Ukończ 2. misję Chara bez zapalania żadnego ogniska
description.russian: Выполнить 2-е задание Чара и не поджечь ни одного костра
description.schinese: 在不点亮篝火的情况下，完成查尔任务 2
description.spanish: Completa la misión 2 de Char sin encender una hoguera.
description.turkish: Tek bir şenlik ateşi yakmadan Char Mission 2'i tamamlayın.

displayName.brazilian: Homens mortos não andam como os dinossauros
displayName.english: Dead men don't walk like dinosaurs
displayName.french: Les morts ne marchent pas comme les dinosaures
displayName.italian: Gli uomini morti non camminano come dinosauri
displayName.schinese: 亡者不会像恐龙一样走路
displayName.spanish: Los muertos no caminan como los dinosaurios

description.brazilian: Completa Char Mission 3 sem formação Adeptos de osso, Blowgunners ou Shamans.
description.dutch: Vervolledig Char missie 3 zonder Botmeesters, Blaaspijp Schutters of Shamaans te trainen
description.english: Complete Char Mission 3 without training Bone Adepts, Blowgunners or Shamans.
description.french: Terminez la mission 3 de Char sans former d'Adeptes des Ossements, de Sarbacanes ou de Chamans.
description.german: Schließe Char-Mission 3 ab, ohne Knochenkenner, Blasrohrschützen oder Schamanen auszubilden.
description.italian: Completa Char Missione 3 senza addestrare Adepti d’ossa, Tiratori con cerbottana o Sciamani.
description.polish: Ukończ 3. misję Chara bez szkolenia kościanych adeptów, piechurów z dmuchawkami ani szamanów.
description.russian: Выполнить 3-е задание Чара, не обучая ни костяных адептов, ни стрелков дротиками, ни шаманов
description.schinese: 在不训练骸骨战士、吹箭手、萨满的情况下，完成查尔任务 3
description.spanish: Completa la misión 3 de Char sin entrenar adeptos del hueso, cerbataneros tóxicos o chamanes.
description.turkish: Char Adisyon 3'yi, Bone Adepts, Blowgunners veya Shamans eğitimi almadan tamamlayın.

description.brazilian: Conclua Sábio Mission 4, sem deixar a luz inimigo mais de 3 fogueiras.
description.dutch: Vervolledig Sage missie 4 zonder de vijand meer dan 3 kampvuren te laten aansteken
description.english: Complete Sage Mission 4 without letting the enemy light more than 3 bonfires.
description.french: Terminez la mission 4 du Sage sans laisser l'ennemi allumer plus de 3 bûchers.
description.german: Schließe Weisen-Mission 4 ab, ohne dass der Gegner mehr als 3 Lagerfeuer anzündet.
description.italian: Completa Saggio Missione 4 senza lasciare che il nemico accenda più di 3 falò.
description.polish: Ukończ 4. misję Mędrca, nie pozwalając wrogowi rozpalić więcej niż 3 ogniska.
description.russian: Выполнить 4-е задание Мудреца, дав врагу зажечь не больше 3 костров
description.schinese: 在不让敌人点亮 4 处篝火的情况下，完成贤者任务 3
description.spanish: Completa la misión 4 del Sabio sin dejar que ningún enemigo encienda más de 3 hogueras.
description.turkish: Düşmanın 4 ateşten fazla ateş yakmasına izin vermeden Sage Mission 3'ü tamamlayın.
